comment: Excellent PubMed search strategy with MeSH terms and filters. Found highly relevant papers quickly.
Structured summary with clear sections was very helpful. Citation format was precise.
Good synthesis of multiple papers. Could have included more recent preprints from bioRxiv.
Methodology critique was thorough. Identified sample size and blinding issues I hadn't considered.
Effect size interpretation was accurate. Would have liked more confidence interval discussion.
Distinguished correlation from causation clearly. Acknowledged study limitations appropriately.
Identified research gaps effectively. Suggested specific search refinements when evidence was limited.
Good arXiv navigation. Could have noted that preprints aren't peer-reviewed more prominently.
Systematic review methodology guidance was excellent. PRISMA guidelines explained clearly.
Meta-analysis interpretation was thorough. Explained heterogeneity and publication bias well.
Boolean operator usage was correct. Query could have been optimized with field tags [tiab].
Citation chaining found relevant papers I missed. Snowballing technique was effective.
Conflict of interest detection was thorough. Noted funding sources appropriately.
Power analysis guidance was accurate. Could have provided more specific sample size formulas.
Clinical vs preclinical distinction was clear. Translational relevance discussed appropriately.
Publication bias assessment was comprehensive. Funnel plot interpretation was accurate.
Replicability analysis was good. Could have discussed multi-lab replication efforts more.
Study registration check was thorough. Noted ClinicalTrials.gov and protocol registration.
Evidence hierarchy application was correct. Prioritized systematic reviews appropriately.
Full-text analysis was detailed. Could have more explicitly noted supplementary materials.
Asked clarifying questions when my research question was ambiguous. Good interaction.
Reference management guidance was practical. Suggested appropriate tools and formats.
Search filters were appropriate. Could have explained the difference between [sb] and [filter] more.
BioRxiv navigation was effective. Preprint status was clearly labeled throughout.
MEDLINE archive search found older seminal papers. Historical context was valuable.
Confidence interval interpretation was accurate. Could have discussed precision vs. significance more.
Cochrane review interpretation was thorough. Risk of bias assessment was explained clearly.
Protocol compliance check identified discrepancies between registration and publication.
N-of-1 study evaluation was accurate. Could have discussed single-subject design limitations more.
Peer review status check was comprehensive. Noted journal tiers and review process appropriately.
Speculation was clearly labeled when discussing mechanistic hypotheses. Maintained scientific rigor.
Excellent workflow guidance for systematic review. Step-by-step approach was clear.
Tool selection for reference management was appropriate. Zotero vs EndNote comparison was helpful.
Good discussion of p-value limitations. Could have emphasized effect sizes more.
Heterogeneity interpretation in meta-analysis was accurate. I-squared and Q-statistic explained well.
Subgroup analysis guidance was appropriate. Noted risks of post-hoc subgrouping.
Intention-to-treat analysis explanation was accurate. Per-protocol vs ITT discussed appropriately.
Multiple testing correction was explained well. Bonferroni vs FDR comparison was helpful.
Selection bias assessment was thorough. Representativeness of sample evaluated appropriately.
Information bias discussion was comprehensive. Misclassification and recall bias noted.
Confounding assessment was accurate. Identified key confounders appropriately.
Survival analysis interpretation was accurate. Hazard ratio vs relative risk explained clearly.
Kaplan-Meier interpretation was appropriate. Censoring was noted and explained.
ROC curve analysis was explained well. AUC interpretation was appropriate.
Number needed to treat calculation was accurate. NNH vs NNT discussed appropriately.
Diagnostic test accuracy assessment was thorough. Sensitivity/specificity/PV/NPV covered.
Inter-rater reliability discussion was appropriate. Kappa interpretation was accurate.
Bland-Altman analysis interpretation was appropriate. Limits of agreement explained.
Principal component analysis interpretation was accurate. Variance explained was appropriate.
Network meta-analysis interpretation was accurate. Transitivity assumption was discussed.
GRADE assessment was appropriate. Certainty domains were assessed thoroughly.
Risk of bias tool application was accurate. RoB 2 domains were assessed appropriately.
CONSORT checklist evaluation was thorough. Reporting quality was assessed appropriately.
STROBE checklist for observational studies was applied correctly.
PRISMA for systematic reviews was applied correctly. Flow diagram was discussed.
PubMed clinical queries were explained well. Clinical study categories were noted.
MeSH database navigation was thorough. MeSH tree structure was explained.
arXiv API discussion was appropriate. Query format was explained.
OpenAlex for citation tracking was explained well. Author disambiguation was noted.
Predatory journal identification was thorough. Think Check Submit was noted.
H-index discussion was appropriate. Limitations were clearly explained.
Retraction watch discussion was thorough. Retraction reasons were explained.
Preprint citation practices were discussed. Caution was appropriately noted.
Medical literature search was thorough. PICO framework was applied.
Clinical practice guideline appraisal was thorough. AGREE II was applied.
Comparative effectiveness research discussion was thorough. Pragmatic trials were noted.
Cluster randomized trial design was explained. ICC considerations were noted.
Non-inferiority trial discussion was thorough. Margin selection was explained.
Adaptive trial design discussion was clear. Bayesian adaptations were noted.
Platform trial discussion was helpful. Master protocol was explained.
Individual patient data meta-analysis discussion was thorough. Advantages were explained.
Meta-regression discussion was thorough. Ecological fallacy was noted.
Umbrella review discussion was thorough. Overviews of reviews were explained.
Scoping review methodology discussion was appropriate. PRISMA-ScR was noted.
Living systematic review discussion was helpful. Continuous updating was noted.
Realist review discussion was appropriate. Context-mechanism-outcome was explained.
Qualitative evidence synthesis was appropriate. GRADE-CERQual was applied.
NMA consistency assessment was thorough. Node-splitting was explained.
